tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address VARCHAR(150),
  income DECIMAL,
  purchase_history JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    last_purchase_date DATE,
    total_purchases INT,
    average_purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    last_page_visited VARCHAR,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE DemographicData (
    customer_id INT,
    income DECIMAL(10,2),
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    marital_status VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_demographics_customer FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BehavioralData (
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_history TEXT,
    website_activity TEXT,
    feedback_response TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_behavioral_customer FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerProfiles(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  income DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  purchase_history JSON,
  website_activity JSON
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  campaign_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerProfiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE DemographicData (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income INT,
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    employment_status VARCHAR(50),
    marital_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE BehavioralData (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    website_visits INT,
    purchase_history JSON,
    loyalty_points INT,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience JSON,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    submitted_at TIMESTAMP
);
